function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of insufficient UV radiation emission from the fixture","Impact":"Reduced germicidal efficacy and ineffective disinfection","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of UV-C lamps and fixtures","Technologies":"UV-C lamp fixtures with uniform emission distribution","People":"Occupants of the environment and maintenance staff","Owner":"Maintenance staff and facility management"},{"Description":"Environmental impact of UV-C lamps using low-pressure mercury","Impact":"Environmental contamination and pollution from improper disposal","Mitigation":"Proper disposal and recycling of UV-C lamps","Technologies":"Mercury-free UV-C lamps","People":"Environmental regulators and waste management authorities","Owner":"Facility management and waste management authorities"},{"Description":"Risk of inadequate exposure to UV radiation due to distance and airflow pattern","Impact":"Incomplete disinfection and insufficient reduction of airborne pathogens","Mitigation":"Optimization of fixture placement and airflow control measures","Technologies":"UV-C lamp positioning sensors and airflow control systems","People":"Occupants of the environment and facility management","Owner":"Facility management and engineering personnel"}]}
